about_the_game:
• Fight unending waves of fruit minions.

    Every minute, the buzzer rings and its time for a challenging new wave of enemies to appear and attack.


  • Meet the champions in the ring

    Brace yourself for exhilarating showdowns with the personality infused fruit champion bosses which are brought to life through stellar voice acting. Each boss has their own set of unique mechanics, strengths and weaknesses.


  • Become stronger after each attempt

    Earn prize money and upgrade your abilities to the next level, with each level granting it a powerful new effect. Collect power up chests dropped from enemies during each run to further amplify your strength!

  • Customize your character

    Discover and acquire exclusive ring gear, featuring a wide array of modern pro wrestling attire, iconic Japanese outfits, and the most extravagant luchador costumes. Not only can you fight in style but the outfits provide powerful buffs to your skills, taking ability combinations to near infinite levels!

  • Up for a challenge?

    Complete various challenges and earn rewards. Could you defeat a fruit boss without taking damage? Or complete a whole playthrough with only one ability active?

Not only can you fight in style but the outfits provide powerful buffs to your skills, taking ability combinations to near infinite levels!

name: Fruits of Fury

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 or 11
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz or faster processor
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lace up your boots! Fruits of Fury is a bullethell roguelike (bullet heaven) where you will decimate waves of fruit minions using an arsenal of unlockable and upgradeable skills. Then, step into the ring and face off against the champion fruit bosses as you journey from rookie to legend!
